<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Blanket PO">06923a4fdb10881096b17d8bbf9619a3</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Attachement check</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {

  var count = getSCAttachmentCount();

  if(count <= 0) {

  alert('You must attach fully executed agreement and/or a quote for the project or services to be provided before submitting this request.');

  return false;

  
  }

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>LGOMEZ</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-10-17 22:28:59</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_id>bfbd7cbddba8cc9474471cb51b961940</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Attachement check</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Supply Chain Incidents" source="x_sthc_supply_chai">ba60d82e6ff98f00277218d22e3ee42a</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Supply Chain Incidents">ba60d82e6ff98f00277218d22e3ee42a</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_bfbd7cbddba8cc9474471cb51b961940</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>LGOMEZ</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-10-17 22:33:28</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
